title: Hidden Files: Law Enforcement's True Case Stories of the Unexplained and Paranormal
description: Hidden Files is a collection of true stories of unexplained events from law enforcement officers across the United States and Canada. Most of the incidents involve actual police cases or occurred while the officer was on duty, a few entail personal, off-duty experience -- but all are thought-provoking.-- Provides a look at unexplained phenomena from a decidedly different perspective-- U.S. government considers police officers to be some of the most credible witnesses of unexplained and paranormal events because they are trained to accurately observe, think analytically, and solve "mysteries"-- A fascinating topic grounded in true and amazing stories
author: Sue Kovach
